name: 羅元隆
objective:
本課程介紹基本的力學理論基礎，授課內容包含：緒論、向量、質點平衡、力系合成、剛體之平衡、結構分析、內力、摩擦力、重心與質心、慣性矩、以及虛功原理。
This course introduces fundamentals of engineering statics, including introduction, vector mechanics, equilibrium of a particle, force system resultant, equilibrium of a rigid body, structural analysis, internal force, friction force, center of gravity and centroid, moment of inertia, and the principle of virtual work.
schedule:
W01: Introduction
W02: Vector mechanics
W03: Equilibrium of a particle
W04: Force system resultant
W05: Equilibrium of a rigid body
W06: Equilibrium of a rigid body
W07: Structural analysis
W08: Structural analysis
W09: Midterm exam
W10: Internal force
W11: Friction force
W12: Center of gravity and centroid
W13: Center of gravity and centroid
W14: Moment of inertia
W15: Moment of inertia
W16: Principle of virtual work
W17: Principle of virtual work
W18: Final exam
scorePolicy:

Final exam: 20%
Two extra tests: 40%
materials: R.C. Hibbeler, ”Engineering Mechanic-Statics.” Pearson, Prentice Hall. (課堂上宣布使用的版本)
